list.abs: I had a nighttime meal., 我吃了一个夜间餐.
Light pollution is any artificial nighttime light that shines where it isn ' t needed., 光污染是任何人为的夜间灯光照耀下是没有必要.
photo tip : nighttime photographs almost always require long exposures .拍照小技巧：拍夜景基本上都要用到长时间曝光。
nighttime temperatures in winter often drop below freezing .冬天的夜间温度，经常低于冰点。

entry.def: Night-time is the period of time between when it gets dark and when the sun rises.

example.ex: They wanted someone responsible to look after the place at night-time...
example.tran: 他们想要个有责任心的人夜间照管这个地方。

example.ex: A twelve hour night time curfew is in force.

means.word_mean: 1. the time after sunset and before sunrise while it is dark outside
1. happening during or appropriate to the night;
